Setting up the authentication

The is a wiki on setting up the authentication to access the nettskjema through the api. This will need to be completed before you can access any other features of this package.

Example

Currently there are very few functions actually working in the package. The most important, is the function that will download nettskjema submission data and return them as a tibble (data.frame). This needs only the id of a nettskjema, which can be found in the last part of the nettskjema url.

library(nettskjema)

nettskjema_get_data(nettskjema_id)

If you do not have the codebook activated, or you want to use the full answers to questions rather than the coded ones, you can toggle off code book answers:

nettskjema_get_data(nettskjema_id, use_codebook = FALSE)

Documentation

Package documentation can be found on the associated GitHub pages, among other documentation on how to create the API acces user and token.
